name: expo-inklink-payment-api
description: Payment processing Lambda function for expo-inklink

scripts.build: tsc && cp package.json dist && cp package-lock.json dist && cd dist && npm install --silent --omit=dev && cd ..
scripts.build:win: tsc && powershell -Command "Copy-Item package.json dist" && powershell -Command "Copy-Item package-lock.json dist" && cd dist && npm install --silent --omit=dev && cd ..
scripts.deploy: cd dist && zip -rq payment-function.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name expo-inklink-payment --zip-file fileb://payment-function.zip --region us-east-2 --query 'FunctionName' --output text && cd .. && rm -rf dist
scripts.deploy:win: cd dist && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath payment-function.zip" && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name expo-inklink-payment --zip-file fileb://payment-function.zip --region us-east-2 --query 'FunctionName' --output text && cd .. && powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist"
